title: Dragon Ball Movie 1 – Curse of the Blood Rubies
alternative_title: Dragon Ball Movie 1: Shen Long no Densetsu, Dragon Ball Movie 1: Shen Long no Densetsu
description: A retelling of Dragon Ball's origins, this is a different version of the meeting of Goku, Bulma, Oolong, and Yamucha. They are all looking for the dragon balls for different reasons when they cross paths with an evil king named Gourmeth, who is also looking for the dragon balls.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Adventure>, <Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Fantasy>, <Genre -> Shounen>, <Genre -> Super Power>]
